author: Staff Reporter
text:
Retired police personnel staged a demonstration in front of the Collectorate pressing for their 10-point charter of demands on Monday.

The demonstration was spearheaded by the Retired Police Officials Association. Selvaraj, district president and retired DSP, said they were demanding the government to extend terminal benefits to all the retired constables and head constables, issue regular ration cards instead of khakhi colour card, and extend free ration.

District secretary Raja Singh proposed a vote of thanks.
title: Demo staged
